TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MaskedTextBox extends System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase

summary.span: 使用掩码区分正确的和不正确的用户输入。

span.span: Uses a mask to distinguish between proper and improper user input.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是 支持声明性语法的增强型控件，用于接受或拒绝用户输入。The class is an enhanced control that supports a declarative syntax for accepting or rejecting user input. 使用 属性，可以指定以下输入，而无需在应用程序中编写任何自定义验证逻辑：Using the property, you can specify the following input without writing any custom validation logic in your application: - 必需的输入字符。Required input characters. - 可选的输入字符。Optional input characters. - 掩码中给定位置应有的输入类型。例如，数字或字母或字母数字字符。The type of input expected at a given position in the mask; for example, a digit, or an alphabetic or alphanumeric character. - 掩码文本或应直接出现在中的字符 ; 例如，连字符在电话号码中 ( ) ，或者价格中的货币符号。Mask literals, or characters that should appear directly in the ; for example, the hyphens (-) in a phone number, or the currency symbol in a price. - 输入字符的特殊处理;例如，将字母字符转换为大写。Special processing for input characters; for example, to convert alphabetic characters to uppercase. 当在 运行时显示控件时，它将掩码表示为一系列提示字符和可选的文字字符。When a control is displayed at run time, it represents the mask as a series of prompt characters and optional literal characters. 表示必需或可选输入的每个可编辑掩码位置都以单个提示字符显示。Each editable mask position, representing a required or optional input, is shown with a single prompt character. 例如，数字符号 ( # ) 通常用作数字字符输入的占位符。For example, the number sign (#) is often used as a placeholder for a numeric character input. 您可以使用 属性来指定自定义提示字符。You can use the property to specify a custom prompt character. 属性确定用户在控件失去输入焦点时是否看到提示字符。The property determines if the user sees the prompt characters when the control loses input focus. 当用户在掩码文本框中键入输入时，有效的输入字符将以连续方式替换其各自的提示字符。As the user types input into the masked text box, valid input characters replace their respective prompt characters in a sequential fashion. 如果用户键入无效的输入字符，则不会发生替换，但如果将属性设置为，则会发出嘟嘟声， `true` 并 引发事件。If the user types an invalid input character, no replacement occurs, but instead a beep is issued if the property is set to `true`, and the event is raised. 可以通过处理此事件提供自己的自定义错误逻辑。You can provide your own custom error logic by handing this event. 当当前插入点位于文本字符上时，用户将具有多个选项：When the current insertion point is at a literal character, the user has a number of options: - 如果键入了除 prompt 字符之外的字符，则将自动跳过文本，并将输入字符应用到下一个可编辑位置，用下一个提示字符表示。If a character other than the prompt character is typed, the literal will automatically be skipped and the input character will be applied to the next editable position, represented by the next prompt character. - 如果键入了 prompt 并将该 属性设置为 true，则输入将覆盖提示字符，并将插入点移到掩码中的下一个位置。If the prompt character is typed and the property is true, the input will overtype the prompt character and insertion point will be moved to the next position in the mask. - 通常情况下，可以使用箭头键导航到上一个或后续的位置。As is always the case, the arrow keys can be used to navigate to a previous or subsequent position. 您可以使用 属性来验证用户是否输入了所有必需的输入。You can use the property to verify whether or not the user has entered all of the required input. 属性将始终根据掩码和属性检索用户输入的格式 。The property will always retrieve the user's input formatted according to the mask and the property. 控件实际上会将所有的掩码处理延迟到 由属性指定的类 。The control actually defers all mask processing to the class specified by the property. 此标准提供程序支持除代理项和垂直组合字符之外的所有 Unicode 字符;但是， 可以使用属性将输入限制为 a-z、a-z 和0-9。This standard provider supports all Unicode characters except for surrogates and vertically combined characters; however, the property can be used to restrict input to the characters sets a-z, A-Z, and 0-9. 掩码并不一定保证用户的输入将表示给定类型的有效值;例如，可以输入-9 年的期限。Masks do not necessarily guarantee that a user's input will represent a valid value for a given type; for example, -9 could be entered for an age in years. 可以通过将值类型的实例分配给属性来验证用户的输入是否表示有效的值 。You can verify that a user's input represents a valid value by assigning an instance of that value's type to the property. 通过监视事件，可以检测用户是否从 其包含无效值时删除焦点 。You can detect whether the user removes focus from when it contains an invalid value by monitoring for the event. 如果类型验证成功，则表示该值的对象将通过 参数的属性提供 。If type validation succeeds, the object representing the value will be available through the property of the parameter. 与控件一样 ，一些常见的键盘快捷方式不适用于 。As with the control, several common keyboard shortcuts do not work with . 具体而言，按 CTRL + (右对齐文本) ，CTRL-L (左对齐文本) ，而 CTRL-L (中心文本) 不起作用。In particular, CTRL-R (right justify text), CTRL-L (left justify text), and CTRL-L (center text) have no effect. ## 与 Visual Basic 6.0 兼容Compatibility with Visual Basic 6.0 旨在保留 Visual Basic 6.0 中掩码编辑控件的大多数功能。 was designed to retain most of the functionality of the Masked Edit control in Visual Basic 6.0. 下表列出了掩码编辑控件上的公共属性，并为其提供了其等效项 。The following table lists common properties on the Masked Edit control and gives their equivalents on . |屏蔽编辑控件 (Visual Basic 6.0) 属性Masked Edit control (Visual Basic 6.0) property|等效的 MaskedTextBox ( .NET Framework) 属性Equivalent MaskedTextBox (.NET Framework) property| |-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |`AllowPrompt` 属性`AllowPrompt` property|| |`AutoTab` 属性`AutoTab` property|无None| |`ClipMode` 属性`ClipMode` property|| |`ClipText` 属性`ClipText` property| 当 设置为时 () (when is set to )| |`Format` 属性`Format` property|无None| |`FormattedText` 属性`FormattedText` property| 当 设置为时 () (when is set to )| |`Mask` 属性`Mask` property|| |`PromptChar` 属性`PromptChar` property|| |`PromptInclude` 属性`PromptInclude` property|| |`ValidationError` 事件`ValidationError` event|| > [!CAUTION] > 控件不支持多行配置或撤消功能。The control does not support multiline configuration or undo functionality. 但是，虽然与这些功能关联的成员已保留，以便与基类兼容 ，但它们的实现不执行任何操作。However, while the members associated with these features have been retained for compatibility with the base class, their implementations perform no actions. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将初始化 以接受日期，并同时使用 和 事件向用户通知无效的输入。The following code example initializes the to accept a date, and uses both the and events to alert the user to invalid input. [!code-csharp[MaskInputRejectedSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MaskInputRejectedSample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MaskInputRejectedSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MaskInputRejectedSample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `maskedTextProvider`参数定义使用的掩码语言 。The `maskedTextProvider` parameter defines the masking language used by . 它负责分析掩码，并确定用户输入是否符合当前掩码位置。It is responsible for parsing the mask and determining whether user input conforms to the current mask position. 你可以从派生新类 以定义你自己的自定义掩码语言，并使用 构造函数来替换标准 。You can derive a new class from to define your own custom masking language, and use the constructor to replace the standard . 如果要使用默认掩码语言并提供自己的输入掩码，则无需使用此构造函数。If you want to use the default masking language and supply your own input mask, you do not need to use this constructor. 相反，可以使用 构造函数，或使用无参数构造函数，然后设置 属性。Instead, you can either use the constructor, or use the parameterless constructor then set the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 即使 为 `true` ，提示字符也必须对掩码中的当前位置有效，才能接受。Even when is `true`, the prompt character must be valid for the current location in the mask in order to be accepted. 例如，如果 为 "\*"，并且掩码中的当前位置要求用户输入一个数字，则输入一个星号 (\*) 会失败，并导致 事件发生。For example, if is "\*", and the current location in the mask demands the user enter a digit, entering an asterisk (\*) will fail and cause the event to occur. 属性优先于 。The property takes precedence over .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定在将文本 复制到剪贴板或通过属性检索文本后，如何解释该文本在控件中的选定内容 。The property determines how text, selected within the control, is interpreted when it is copied to the clipboard or retrieved through the property. 具体来说，它确定在访问选定文本时是否包括原义字符和/或提示字符。Specifically, it determines whether literal characters, prompt characters, or both are included when selected text is accessed. 排除提示字符后，会将其转换为复制的字符串中的空格。When prompt characters are excluded, they are transformed into spaces in the copied string. > [!NOTE] > 属性的作用与解释属性的方式类似 。The property serves a similar purpose with respect to how the property is interpreted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性控制控件的字符插入行为 。The property controls the character insertion behavior of the control. 此属性的状态由枚举定义，该 枚举可以始终打开、始终关闭或设置为遵循用户键盘的设置。The state of this property is defined by the enumeration, which can be always on, always off or set to respect the setting of the user's keyboard. 此属性取代了键盘的插入模式。This property supersedes the insertion mode of the keyboard. 例如，如果键盘设置为 overwrite，但 设置为 `Insert` ，则 将以插入模式操作。For example, if the keyboard is set to overwrite, but is set to `Insert`, the will operate in insert mode. 属性将访问的真实插入模式 。The property will access the true insertion mode of the . 如果更改 的值更改 ， 将引发 事件。If changing changes the value of , will raise the event. 如果未设置掩码，此属性将不起作用。This property has no effect if no mask has been set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是类的默认属性 。 is the default property for the class. 必须是由一个或多个屏蔽元素组成的字符串，如下表所示。 must be a string composed of one or more of the masking elements, as shown in the following table. 使用的掩码语言由 其关联的定义 。The masking language used by is defined by its associated . 标准提供程序根据 Visual Basic 6.0 中掩码编辑控件使用的掩码语言指定掩码语言，并对从该平台迁移的用户非常熟悉。The standard provider specifies a masking language based upon the one used by the Masked Edit control in Visual Basic 6.0, and should be very familiar to users migrating from that platform. |屏蔽元素Masking element|说明Description| |---------------------|-----------------| |00|需要数字。Digit, required. 此元素将接受0到9之间的任何单个数字。This element will accept any single digit between 0 and 9.| |99|数字或空格，可选。Digit or space, optional.| |#|数字或空格，可选。Digit or space, optional. 如果此位置在掩码中为空，它将在属性中呈现为一个空格 。If this position is blank in the mask, it will be rendered as a space in the property. 此外，还允许 (+) 和减号 (-) 符号。Plus (+) and minus (-) signs are allowed.| |LL|需要的字母。Letter, required. 将输入限制为 ASCII 字符 a-z 和 a-z。Restricts input to the ASCII letters a-z and A-Z. 此掩码元素等效于正则表达式中的 [a zA-Z]。This mask element is equivalent to [a-zA-Z] in regular expressions.| |??|字母，可选。Letter, optional. 将输入限制为 ASCII 字符 a-z 和 a-z。Restricts input to the ASCII letters a-z and A-Z. 此掩码元素等同于 [zA-Z]？This mask element is equivalent to [a-zA-Z]? 在正则表达式中。in regular expressions.| |&|字符，必填。Character, required. 如果将 属性设置为 true，则此元素的行为类似于 "L" 元素。If the property is set to true, this element behaves like the "L" element.| |CC|字符，可选。Character, optional. 任何非控制字符。Any non-control character. 如果将 属性设置为 `true` ，则此元素的行为类似于 "？" 元素。If the property is set to `true`, this element behaves like the "?" element.| |AA|字母数字，必填。Alphanumeric, required. 如果将 属性设置为 `true` ，则它将接受的唯一字符是 ASCII 字符 a-z 和 a-z。If the property is set to `true`, the only characters it will accept are the ASCII letters a-z and A-Z. 此掩码元素的行为类似于 "a" 元素。This mask element behaves like the "a" element.| |aa|字母数字，可选。Alphanumeric, optional. 如果将 属性设置为 `true` ，则它将接受的唯一字符是 ASCII 字符 a-z 和 a-z。If the property is set to `true`, the only characters it will accept are the ASCII letters a-z and A-Z. 此掩码元素的行为类似于 "A" 元素。This mask element behaves like the "A" element.| |..|小数点占位符。Decimal placeholder. 使用的实际显示字符将是适用于格式提供程序的小数点符号，由控件的 属性确定。The actual display character used will be the decimal symbol appropriate to the format provider, as determined by the control's property.| |,,|千位占位符。Thousands placeholder. 使用的实际显示字符将是适用于格式提供程序的千位占位符，由控件的属性确定 。The actual display character used will be the thousands placeholder appropriate to the format provider, as determined by the control's property.| |::|时间分隔符。Time separator. 使用的实际显示字符将是适用于格式提供程序的时间符号，由控件的 属性确定。The actual display character used will be the time symbol appropriate to the format provider, as determined by the control's property.| |/|日期分隔符。Date separator. 使用的实际显示字符将是适用于格式提供程序的日期符号，由控件的 属性确定。The actual display character used will be the date symbol appropriate to the format provider, as determined by the control's property.| |$|货币符号。Currency symbol. 显示的实际字符将是适用于格式提供程序的货币符号，由控件的 属性确定。The actual character displayed will be the currency symbol appropriate to the format provider, as determined by the control's property.| |\<|向下移动。Shift down. 将后面的所有字符转换为小写。Converts all characters that follow to lowercase.| |>|向上移动。Shift up. 将后面的所有字符转换为大写。Converts all characters that follow to uppercase.| ||||禁用上一个 shift 或向下移动。Disable a previous shift up or shift down.| |\\|Esc.Escape. 转义掩码字符，并将其转换为文本。Escapes a mask character, turning it into a literal. " \\ \\ " 是反斜杠的转义序列。"\\\\" is the escape sequence for a backslash.| |所有其他字符All other characters|文字。Literals. 所有非掩码元素都将作为自身显示在中 。All non-mask elements will appear as themselves within . 文本在运行时始终在掩码中占用一个静态位置，用户不能移动或删除它。Literals always occupy a static position in the mask at run time, and cannot be moved or deleted by the user.| 如果在 已包含由以前的掩码筛选的用户输入时更改掩码， 将尝试将该输入迁移到新的掩码定义中。If you change a mask when already contains user input filtered by a previous mask, will attempt to migrate that input into the new mask definition. 如果该操作失败，则会清除现有输入。If it fails, it will clear the existing input. 将长度为零的字符串指定为掩码将保留控件中的任何现有数据。Assigning a zero-length string as the mask will preserve any existing data in the control. 与零长度掩码一起使用时，的 行为类似于单行 控件。When used with a zero-length mask, behaves like a single-line control. Decimal ( ) ，千位数 (，) ，time (： ) 、date (/) 和 currency ($) 符号默认为按应用程序的区域性定义的方式显示这些符号。The decimal (.), thousandths (,), time (:), date (/), and currency ($) symbols default to displaying those symbols as defined by the application's culture. 可以通过使用属性强制它们显示另一区域性的符号 。You can force them to display symbols for another culture by using the property. 在运行时掩码中插入的字符由 属性控制。Character insertion into the mask at run time is controlled by the property. 用户可以通过使用向左箭头和向右箭头键或鼠标光标来浏览掩码，并且可以通过输入空格跳过掩码中的可选位置。Users can navigate through the mask by using the left and right arrow keys or the mouse cursor, and can skip optional positions in the mask by entering a space. > [!IMPORTANT] > 除代理项和垂直组合字符之外，还支持所有 Unicode 字符。 supports all Unicode characters except for surrogates and vertically combined characters. 下表显示了示例掩码。The following table shows example masks. |MaskMask|行为Behavior| |----------|--------------| |`00/00/0000`|日期 (日期、数字月份、年份) ，以国际日期格式。A date (day, numeric month, year) in international date format. "/" 字符是一个逻辑日期分隔符，将显示给用户作为应用程序当前区域性的合适日期分隔符。The "/" character is a logical date separator, and will appear to the user as the date separator appropriate to the application's current culture.| |`00->L美国格式的日期 (日、月份缩写和年份) ，其中，三个字母的月份缩写以后跟两个小写字母的前大写字母显示。A date (day, month abbreviation, and year) in United States format in which the three-letter month abbreviation is displayed with an initial uppercase letter followed by two lowercase letters.| |`(999)-000-0000`|美国的电话号码，可选择的区域代码。United States phone number, area code optional. 如果用户不想输入可选字符，则可以输入空格，或者将鼠标指针直接置于掩码中由前0表示的位置。If users do not want to enter the optional characters, they can either enter spaces or place the mouse pointer directly at the position in the mask represented by the first 0.| |`$999,999.00`|介于0到999999之间的货币值。A currency value in the range of 0 to 999999. 在运行时，将用其特定于区域性的等效项替换货币、千位和十进制字符。The currency, thousandth, and decimal characters will be replaced at run time with their culture-specific equivalents.|

summary.span: 当用户的输入或者分配的字符与输入掩码的对应格式元素不匹配时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user's input or assigned character does not match the corresponding format element of the input mask.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是类的默认事件 。 is the default event for the class. 当某个字符被输入掩码拒绝时发生此事件。The event occurs when a character is rejected by the input mask. 由属性表示的输入掩码通过 属性与该控件关联的掩码文本提供程序来进行解释 。The input mask, represented by the property, is interpreted by the masked text provider associated with the control through the property. 在以下情况下会引发： is raised in the following situations: - 输入字符与相应的格式元素不匹配。An input character does not match the corresponding format element. 例如，用户在需要数字时输入字母字符。For example, the user enters an alphabetic character when a digit is required. 这可能是引发此事件的最常见原因。This is probably the most common reason why this event is raised. - 用户尝试在掩码末尾以外输入无关字符，这可能是因为已经填充了掩码，或者当前插入符号位置已移至显示的输入掩码字符串的最末尾。The user is trying to input extraneous characters beyond the end of the mask either because the mask has already been filled or the current caret position has been moved to the very end of the displayed input mask string. - "粘贴" 操作会插入与其关联格式元素不匹配的字符，如果 属性为 `false` ，则它会将现有字符移动到与其格式元素不匹配的新位置。A paste operation either inserts a character that does not match its associated format element, or if the property is `false`, it shifts existing characters into new positions where they do not match their format elements. - 剪切操作将现有字符向左移动，并且一个或多个字符与新关联的格式元素不匹配。A cut operation shifts existing characters to the left, and one or more characters do not match their newly associated format elements. - 对属性进行了赋值 ，分配的字符串导致了一个或多个掩码冲突。An assignment was made to the property and the assigned string caused one or more mask violations. 如果向控件分配了导致出现的字符串 ，则不会在中显示字符串的任何部分 。If a string was assigned to the control that causes to occur, no part of the string will appear in . 如果将属性设置为，则的默认处理 将发出嘟嘟声 `true` 。The default handling for will play a beep sound if the property is set to `true`. 此事件通常用于实现自定义错误处理，例如，在掩码已满时移到下一个用户输入控件; 如果输入字符无效，则显示 "自定义错误" 对话框或工具提示。This event is often handled to implement custom error handling, for example, to move to the next user input control if the mask is full, or to display a custom error dialog box or ToolTip if the input character is invalid. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `MaskedTextBox1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `MaskedTextBox1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 获取或设置要取代用户输入而显示的字符。

span.span: Gets or sets the character to be displayed in substitute for user input.

value.span: 用作密码字符的 值。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于敏感用户输入，通常需要隐藏用户输入的实际信息。For sensitive user input, it is common practice to conceal the actual information entered by the user. 如果将 属性设置为非 null 字符， 则会将所有输入的该字符显示在控件中。If the property is set to a non-null character, will display this character for all input into the control. 如果将此属性设置为， `null` 则将禁用此功能。Setting this property to `null` will disable this functionality. 如果要使用在 COMCTL32.dll 中定义的操作系统提供的密码字符，请改用 属性。If you want to use the operating system supplied password character, which is defined in COMCTL32.dll, use the property instead. 如果 和 属性都被激活，则后者优先。If both the and properties are activated, the latter takes precedence. > [!IMPORTANT] > 作为安全方面的考虑， 控件对受密码保护的字符串禁用剪切和复制操作。As a security consideration, the control disables cut and copy operations on password-protected strings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写其基控件的实现 ，以便在用户使用输入法) (编辑器（如用于输入日语、中文和其他复杂的非拉丁脚本）输入字符时正确处理字符事件。 overrides its base control's implementation of to properly handle character events when the user is entering characters using an Input Method Editor (IME), such as is used for entering Japanese, Chinese, and other complex non-Latin scripts. 检测收到 WM_IME_CHAR 消息后发生的任何 WM_CHAR 消息，并取消这些消息以防止这些字符显示在控件中。 detects any WM_CHAR messages that occur after it receives a WM_IME_CHAR message and suppresses them in order to prevent these characters from showing up in the control. 如果你从该控件派生并重写此消息，并且你希望新控件使用 Ime，则应复制此行为。If you derive from this control and override this message, you should duplicate this behavior if you wish your new control to work with IMEs.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当遇到第一个无效字符时，是否应停止对用户输入的分析。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the parsing of user input should stop after the first invalid character is reached.

value.span: 如果输入字符串的处理应当在首次出现分析错误时终止，该值为 ；如果处理应忽略所有错误，则为 。

span.span: if processing of the input string should be terminated at the first parsing error; otherwise, if processing should ignore all errors.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有时 ，用户在单个输入操作中输入几个字符，通常通过复制并粘贴字符串。Sometimes the user will enter several characters into a in a single input operation, typically by copying and pasting a string. 如果整个字符串只包含有效字符（根据它们在输入掩码中的粘贴位置），则整个操作都将成功。If the entire string only contains valid characters, according to their paste position in the input mask, then the entire operation will succeed. 但是，当发生分析错误时，的行为 取决于的值 ，如下所示：However, when a parsing error occurs, the behavior of depends on the value of , as follows: - 如果此属性为 `true` ，则输入字符串的处理将在无效字符处停止。If this property is `true`, then processing of the input string stops at the invalid character. 所有后续字符都将被忽略。All subsequent characters are ignored. 引发单个 事件。A single event is raised. - 如果此属性为 `false` ，则拒绝无效的字符，但会继续分析输入字符串中的下一个字符。If this property is `false`, then the invalid character is rejected, but parsing continues with the next character in the input string. 对于输入字符串中的每个无效字符，都将引发一个事件。A event is raised for every invalid character in the input string. 、 和 属性还会影响用户输入的解释。The , and properties can also influence the interpretation of the user input. 如果 属性为 `false` ，则插入点右侧的输入掩码中的任何字符都将被所接受的字符数替换。If the property is `false`, then any characters already in the input mask to the right of the insertion point will be displaced by the accepted number of characters. 这种变化可能会导致其他分析错误。This shifting may cause additional parsing errors. 可以通过设置属性以编程方式模仿粘贴操作 。A pasting operation can be mimicked programmatically by setting the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定应如何处理与提示字符匹配的输入字符。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines how an input character that matches the prompt character should be handled.

value.span: 如果输入的提示字符会导致掩码中的当前可编辑位置被重置，则为 ；否则为 ，以指示要将提示字符作为正常输入字符进行处理。

span.span: if the prompt character entered as input causes the current editable position in the mask to be reset; otherwise, to indicate that the prompt character is to be processed as a normal input character.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以将两类字符-空格和提示字符专门处理。The can treat two categories of characters - spaces and prompt characters - specially. 通常，每个输入字符都将针对掩码进行测试，并接受或拒绝。Typically, each input character will be tested against the mask and either accepted or rejected. 假设将 属性设置为 "非 `null` "，则将属性设置 为 `true` 将导致提示字符进行特殊处理。Assuming that the property is set to non-`null`, then setting the property to `true` will result in special processing for the prompt character. 当用户将提示字符输入到掩码中时，它会导致当前掩码字符位置被清除，并且当前位置要前进到下一个可编辑字符。When the user enters the prompt character into the mask, it causes the current mask character position to be cleared and the current position to be advanced to the next editable character. 优先于 属性，如下表所示。 takes precedence over the property, as shown in the following table. |ResetOnPrompt 值ResetOnPrompt value|AllowPromptAsInput 值AllowPromptAsInput value|产生的行为Resulting behavior| |-------------------------|------------------------------|------------------------| |`true`|`true`|可以输入提示字符，这将导致重置当前掩码位置。The prompt character can be entered and it causes the current mask position to be reset. 这是默认设置。This is the default.| |`true`|`false`|可以输入提示字符，这将导致重置当前掩码位置。The prompt character can be entered and it causes the current mask position to be reset.| |`false`|`true`|将提示字符作为标准输入字符处理。The prompt character is processed as a standard input character.| |`false`|`false`|Prompt 字符无效，并引发 事件。The prompt character is not valid and raises a event.|

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定应如何处理空白输入字符。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines how a space input character should be handled.

value.span: 如果空白输入字符将导致重置掩码中的当前可编辑位置，则为 ；否则为 ，以指示要将其作为正常输入字符进行处理。

span.span: if the space input character causes the current editable position in the mask to be reset; otherwise, to indicate that it is to be processed as a normal input character.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以将两类字符-空格和提示字符专门处理。The can treat two categories of characters - spaces and prompt characters - specially. 通常，每个输入字符都将针对掩码进行测试，并接受或拒绝。Typically, each input character will be tested against the mask and either accepted or rejected. 将属性设置为 `true` 将导致清除当前掩码字符位置，并使当前位置前进到下一个可编辑字符。Setting the property to `true` will result in the current mask character position to be cleared and the current position to be advanced to the next editable character. 字符输入的类型将确定屏蔽引擎是移到掩码中的下一个字符，还是停留在当前位置并等待匹配的字符。The type of character input will determine whether the masking engine moves forward to the next character in the mask, or stays at the current position and waits for a matching character. 如果输入字符是空格，并且与掩码中的当前不可编辑字符不匹配，则掩码引擎将跳到掩码中的下一个字符。If the input character is a space, and does not match the current non-editable character in the mask, the masking engine will skip ahead to the next character in the mask. 如果输入字符不是空格，并且与掩码中的当前不可编辑字符不匹配，则屏蔽引擎将保留在当前掩码位置，并尝试将下一个输入字符与下一个输入字符匹配。If the input character is not a space, and does not match the current non-editable character in the mask, the masking engine will remain at the current mask position, and attempt to match the next input character against it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性检索到的选择将根据控件的格式设置属性（例如、和）进行格式设置 。Selections retrieved using this property are formatted according to the control's formatting properties, such as , , and . 使用此属性的选择集的行为类似于粘贴操作：每个字符都与掩码匹配，并 为无效字符引发事件。Selections set using this property behave like a Paste operation: each character is matched against the mask, and the event is raised for invalid characters. 如果 为 `true` ，则在设置时允许使用文本和提示字符， 除非它们违反掩码，否则将以无提示方式将其删除。If is `true`, literals and prompt characters are allowed when setting , and will be removed silently unless they violate the mask.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否允许用户重新输入原义字符值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user is allowed to reenter literal values.

value.span: 允许重新输入原义字符；否则 阻止用户覆盖原义字符。

span.span: to allow literals to be reentered; otherwise, to prevent the user from overwriting literal characters.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 输入掩码通常包含文本。Input masks commonly contain literals. 当用户在运行时向中输入字符时 ，当前字符位置有时会位于文本上。When the user enters characters into the at runtime, the current character position will sometimes fall on a literal. 属性描述如何处理下一个字符的用户输入，如下所示：The property describes how user input for the next character is to be handled, as follows: - 如果此属性为 `true` ，则用户可以输入与当前位置的文本相同的字符，也可以输入下一个可编辑字符，从而将当前位置跳到该位置。If this property is `true`, the user can either redundantly enter the same character as the literal at the current position, or can enter the next editable character, thereby jumping the current position to that position. - 如果此属性为 `false` ，则用户只能输入下一个可编辑字符。If this property is `false`, the user can only enter the next editable character. 如果掩码中的下一个位置不接受原义字符 (例如，用户键入 "/"，并且下一个位置只接受数字) ，则控件将引发该 事件。If the next position in the mask will not accept the literal character (for example, the user types "/" and the next position only accepts digits), the control will raise the event. 例如，在 "90/90/0000" 日期输入掩码中，正斜杠字符为文本。As an example, in the "90/90/0000" date entry mask, the forward slash characters are literals. 假设用户已输入了两个初始值 "11"，因此掩码中的当前位置位于第一个正斜杠 (/) 文本。Assume that the user has entered two initial digits, "11", so the current position in the mask is at the first forward slash (/) literal. 如果 为 `true` ，则用户具有以下有效选项：If is `true`, then the user has the following valid choices: - 用户可以输入一个 "/" 字符。The user can enter a "/" character. 这会导致将位置移到下一个字符，在此示例中，为第四个位置，即9个屏蔽元素。This results in the position being moved to the next character, which in this example is the fourth position, a 9 masking element. - 用户可以输入下一个可编辑字符，此示例中为一个数字。The user can enter the next editable character, which in this example is a digit. 将验证数字，并且当前位置将自动移动到第五个位置，这是一个0屏蔽元素。The digit would be validated and the current position would automatically be moved to the fifth position, which is a 0 masking element. 如果 为 `false` ，则仅允许有效的数据输入，在此示例中为一个数字。If is `false`, then only a valid data input is allowed, which in this example would be a digit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件可以选择根据属性所定义的类型来验证用户输入 。The control will optionally validate user input against the type defined by its property. 如果此属性不为 `null` ，则将发生以下系列事件：When this property is not `null`, the following series of events occurs: 1. 当发生以下情况之一时，验证序列开始：The validation sequence begins when one of the following occurs: - 控件失去焦点。 control looses focus. - 检索属性。The property is retrieved. - 调用 方法。The method is called. 2. 其中的任何事件都会导致调用 `Parse` 使用属性指定的类型的方法 。Any of these events result in a call to the `Parse` method of the type specified with the property. `Parse` 负责将格式化输入字符串转换为目标类型。`Parse` is responsible for the conversion of the formatted input string to the target type. 成功的转换等同于验证成功。A successful conversion equates to a successful validation. 3. `Parse`返回后，将 引发事件。After `Parse` returns, the event is raised. 此事件的事件处理程序最常实现为执行类型或掩码验证处理。The event handler for this event is most commonly implemented to perform type or mask validation processing. 它接收 包含有关转换的信息的参数; 例如， 成员指示转换是否成功。It receives a parameter containing information about the conversion; for example, the member indicates whether the conversion was successful. 4. 事件的事件处理程序 返回后，将引发标准验证事件 。After the event handler for the event returns, the standard validation event, , is raised. 可以实现处理程序以执行标准验证，其中可能包括取消事件。A handler can be implemented to perform standard validation, perhaps including canceling the event. 5. 如果在步骤3中未取消该事件，则会引发标准控件验证事件 。If the event is not canceled in step 3, the standard control validation event is raised. 如果在 `true` 事件处理程序中将属性设置为 ，则该事件将被取消，并且 控件将保留焦点，除非后续 事件将其属性的版本设置 回 `false` 。If the property is set to `true` in the event handler, the event will be canceled and the control retains focus, unless the subsequent event sets its version of the property back to `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例尝试将用户的输入分析为有效的 对象。The following code example attempts to parse the user's input as a valid object. 如果失败， 事件处理程序会向用户显示一条错误消息。If it fails, the event handler displays an error message to the user. 如果值是有效的 ，则代码验证提供的日期不在今天的日期之前。If the value is a valid , the code verifies that the date supplied is not prior to today's date. 此代码示例要求 Windows 窗体项目包含一个 名为的控件 `MaskedTextBox1` 和一个 名为的控件 `ToolTip1` 。This code example requires that your Windows Forms project contains a control named `MaskedTextBox1` and a control named `ToolTip1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 掩码本身并不保证用户的输入将表示给定类型的有效值。Masks do not in themselves guarantee that a user's input will represent a valid value for a given type. 下面的 c # 代码显示了掩码：The following C# code shows a mask: ``` maskedTextBox1.Mask = "99/99/9999"; ``` 下面的 Visual Basic 代码显示了掩码：The following Visual Basic code shows a mask: `MaskedTextBox1.Mask = "99/99/9999"` 此掩码可以要求用户输入八位数字，但无法验证用户是否在正确的范围内输入月份、日期和年份值;"12/20/2003" 和 "70/90/0000" 同样适用于掩码。This mask can demand that the user enter eight digits, but cannot verify that the user enters month, date, and year values in the correct range; "12/20/2003" and "70/90/0000" are equally valid as far as the mask is concerned. 您可以使用 来验证用户输入的数据是否处于正确的范围内（在前面提到的情况下），方法是将该类型的实例分配给它 。You can use to verify whether the data entered by the user falls within the correct range - in the previously mentioned case, by assigning it an instance of the type. 当用户离开控件时，将验证控件中的当前文本。The current text in the control will be validated either when the user leaves the control. 您可以通过监视事件来确定数据验证是否失败 。You can determine whether or not the data fails validation by monitoring for the event. 仅 当为时，才会执行检查 `true` 。 will only perform the check against if is `true`. 如果要将自己的自定义数据类型与一起使用 ，则必须实现一个 `Parse` 采用字符串作为参数的静态方法。If you want to use your own custom data types with , you must implement a static `Parse` method that takes a string as a parameter. 此方法必须通过以下一个或两个签名来实现：This method must be implemented with one or both of the following signatures: `public static Object Parse(string)` `public static Object Parse(string, IFormatProvider)` ## Examples 下面的代码示例尝试将用户的输入分析为有效的 。The following code example attempts to parse the user's input as a valid . 如果失败， 事件处理程序会向用户显示一条错误消息。If it fails, the event handler displays an error message to the user. 如果值是有效的 ，则代码会执行其他检查，以确保所提供的日期不早于当天日期。If the value is a valid , the code performs an additional check to ensure that the date supplied is not prior to today's date. 此代码示例要求 Windows 窗体项目包含一个 名为的控件 `MaskedTextBox1` 和一个 名为的控件 `ToolTip1` 。This code example requires that your Windows Forms project contains a control named `MaskedTextBox1` and a control named `ToolTip1`.
